participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

t2w_postqc_regt1.Description: Registration error score (0=good registration, 1=mild rotation or translation, 2=moderate rotation or translation, 3=severe rotation or translation)

t2w_postqc_motion.Description: Motion score (0=no motion, 1=mild motion, 2=moderate motion, 3=severe motion artifact)

t2w_postqc_inhomogeneity.Description: Inhomogeneity score (0=no inhomogeneity, 1=mild inhomogeneity, 2=moderate inhomogeneity, 3=severe inhomogeneity)

t2w_postqc_artifact.Description: Artifact score  (0=no susceptibility artifact, 1=mild artifact, 2=moderate artifact, 3=severe artifact)
